summary: At an altitude of 18,000 feet, Alaska's Mount St. Elias is the destination for a trio of mountaineers determined to reach the mountain's summit, and to ski back down as well. Mount St. ... See full summary »
cast: Axel Naglich|Jon Johnston|Peter Ressmann|Paul Claus|Steven Siig|Ruedi Homberger|Günther Göberl|Volker Holzner|Beat Kammerlander
title: Mount St. Elias
